Review.Titre: They’ll cost you your court case
Review.Contenu: GO TO THEIR BBB PAGE!  They cost me and my husband our shot at justice and thousands of dollars. Thorough review will soon come… for now, I advise you to go to their BBB page and look at the massive amount of complaints they have. It’s clear these positive reviews are fake.

Review.Titre: Horrific service, just took the money and didnt do the job
Review.Contenu: Id give a zero if possible. Did not make any attempts to serve within 5 days as stated. Deadline for service was noted at day 14 without a continuance. Date came and past. Defendant was served the incorrect paperwork, but that didnt matter because it was late. I followed up with ABC 6-7 times during the process, communication was late and ineffective.

Review.Titre: Your process server failed to serve
Review.Contenu: Your process server failed to serve the complaint based solely on the representation that the person being served filed bankruptcy and has an attorney, which, in addition to not being true, also is not a basis for failing to serve the complaint.  When this was brought to your attention, you stated that you would charge an addition $150 to go back out to complete service.  In 16 years of practicing law, I have not ever had a process server determine when service was appropriate based on the party being served saying that they filed bankruptcy or had an attorney because, I would imagine, that is not what the process server is being hired to do.  Please refund the money charged for this service and I will remove the negative review online.  We found another process server for this job.

Review.Titre: Very bad experience ABC Legal so far.
Review.Contenu: Very bad experience ABC Legal so far.. really hoping they can fix it. Hired them to serve a case to an individual, and several weeks later only one attempt was made. In addition, several clerical errors have been made through the process, which I have had to reach out to remedy on several occasions. I initially chose to go with ABC because they are a larger company and felt they could get the job done, however I am now learning this was possibly a mistake and I am probably just another person they can overcharge and deliver subpar results to because they are too big to care.

This company is terrible.  I requested service on 3 parties.  They went once and told me the person did not live there and when I asked them to try again they charged be an additional $75 even though I paid for 3 attempts.  Then they said there was a snow storm and they "couldn't reach the address" but there was no picture, next they attempted service at the wrong address but still charged me.

Review.Titre: I've been dealing with the VP of Compliance.
Review.Contenu: I've been dealing (General Counsel/VP of Compliance) about an incident that happened at my home with one of their servers in May 2023. I've made 7 phone calls on 5/26, 2 phones 6/28 and 2 phone calls 7/11. Ive sent several email and pictures, last email was sent on 10/26 with no response. I'm going to make a long story short, Server left my gate open and one of my very expensive dogs got out without my knowledge and has been gone since May, This company refuses to take responsibility for the actions of the server. I'm waiting for a resolution about this matter.

Absolutely horrible experience. I paid for rush process serving for 2 days to be complete and it has been over a week. I’m still waiting to hear why my tenant who needs to be served so I can start the eviction process hasn’t been served yet. I’m totally regretting using ABC Legal.

Terrible.  They don't know the basics of personal service, since they gave me one name of a person to have appointed, and then randomly gave it to two other different people -- that's not good service.  Won't let you talk to the server, to try and get updated information to them on hard to serve people.  They make you do everything all over again and pay double to try different addresses for one target person.  Awful.  Hate them.

Review.Titre: Horrible people doing as little as…
Review.Contenu: Horrible people doing as little as possible to get the process served. Just thinking about attempting during a Tropical Storm counts as an attempt, Sunday morning at 7:45 am for a business in an industrial park, two evenings at 8 p.m. were a waste of time.  Strongly NOT recommended!

Terrible service. I paid for an immediate service 2days. The original documents has to be submitted by me, which means the proof that I printed out was denied by the court. And the originals are God knows where. Terrible service

Process was served but the service paper has YET to be signed by the process server and it’s been almost a week since initial service. The whole point of using this method was to expedite service but now I am being held up by this company and no one is reaching back out to me to respond to what is happening.

Review.Titre: Don't use if you're in a hurry
Review.Contenu: Paid a rush fee, but it wasn't rushed. Then didn't even get done during the standard promised time frame. Deadlines were missed. Finally, service was done after reassignment of three different people, the second of wish lied about the attempt of service.

Review.Titre: Too Slow and Servers Don't Try
Review.Contenu: The prices are severely inconsistent, as they will price the service of process based on the first address listed.  Secondly, whoever ABC Legal uses to serve process, they are not only extremely slow, but they find every excuse in the book not to complete the service.  The prices are okay compared to other companies, but the service is garbage.

Review.Titre: You never served and when I called to…
Review.Contenu: You never served and when I called to find out what was going on four days later, said you don’t serve the area, but you took our money and still haven’t returned it despite two requests.

Worst service company!  Proofs of service are ALWAYS completed incorrectly, resulting in rejections from court.  Process servers falsify proofs, stating they have served individuals that were not in fact served.  They fail to send the required mailings and provide proofs of mailings for sub-serves.  Customer service reps and supervisors place you on hold and then hang up on you.  Phone service hangs up on you after being on hold for 10 minutes.  No replies to messages and requests for corrections.  BEWARE, watch your proofs of service.

The process server did not use common sense to find the address. She wasted two attempts due to "weather conditions" and wasted another attempt saying she couldn't see the house number. Which then they wanted to charge me an additional cost for a new address. I did a quick google search of the property and sent her the screenshot circling the house number. Only then was she able to find it. It took a long time to get the person served. I would recommend using the sheriff's office or a different process server to get your documents served. Not impressed.

Review.Titre: Even after showing the company the CA…
Review.Contenu: Even after showing the company the CA requirement of at least 3 personal service attempts before substitute service, the process server substituted service on the first attempt then again on the second.  He only made a second attempt because I complained!  Now my lawyer says this service may not hold up in court and puts me at legal risk!

Dreadful! Put in an order for rush service on Monday. Didn't hear anything, sent two messages. Finally I called customer service Friday. Said they would get on it ASAP. Another day later, still haven't heard anything. No service, no communication. Will not use again.

Server is terribleHas attempted twice in a week, both times during the middle of the day when tenants are at work. Why doesn't server try in the evening or on the weekend. I have written my comments, last Thursday, to your support email. I am waiting for a response.

Your server tried to serve a company after hours on a Sunday, then took almost 2 weeks to try again, only after I called several times to ask why my paperwork was not being dealt with. I was told the server had a lot on her plate. too bad you offer a service in a timely matter and you did not do that. Hold your people accountable.

I had very high hopes after reading reviews. We used them as a process server and although they completed the service part ok, they made significant errors in the Proof of Service document. Each of their attempts to fix it introduced additional egregious errors in the document, thus holding up our ability to get them on file with the court. Painstakingly slow to respond and consistently frustrating. I will not recommend and will not be using them ever again. Beware!

Review.Titre: Extended delays with no updates outside…
Review.Contenu: Extended delays with no updates outside of the 5 business day window.  Unable to service papers, defaults to not updating the status, and wastes valuable time.

Review.Pseudo: Mark - Law Office of Mark J. Y
Review.Contenu: Late to serve, slow to provide proof of service, failed to return proof of service in consumer notice, generally non-responsive except for customer service, who couldn’t get action from process server either.One and done.  ABC should be XYZ, the last place finisher.Will publicize your incompetence.

Review.Titre: Using them is tantamount to malpractice
Review.Contenu: They promise serviced within 5 days, it weeks.  Their servicer claimed that the original address was unusable because it lacked a unit number.  I paid $235 for investigations to find another service address; the process took months. Then I discovered that the original address was 100% correct, that the building did not have unit numbers.  I asked ABCLegal for a refund and they refused.UPDATE: After kicking up a fuss, they have refunded the investigations. But they refuse to refund the subsequent service attempts, even though they were necessitated by ABCLegal's screw up.

Texas has very specific service laws for out-of-state discovery. I was assured that service would be properly handled; however, it was not. Now, I'm going back and forth with ABC's compliance team about whether I was the one at fault. This is unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Your process server was rude and…
Review.Contenu: Your process server was rude and continued to come to my house when our nurse told her my stepson (who she was looking for) has never lived here. On the third visit I was home and berated her for her aggressive behavior including knocking on our windows!   She refused to identify herself and only admitted she was a process server. If this is indicative of your company's business I would recommend staying far away!  We didn't know what she was up to until the third visit.  I told her to not come back and will pursue legal action for harassment if this continues.  She only flashed this company's card as she left.

They served our clients and then had to redo service, then continually put the paralegal's name as the attorney of record on the proofs of services.  Made several messages to correct it and was ignored. called the rep and they gave the customer service number.  A big mess that should not have happened.

Review.Titre: You charged me another $75 for a second…
Review.Contenu: You charged me another $75 for a second attempt. This charge was not clearly shown before purchase and I have access to other process servers that charge less and do 3 attempts included in the base price. You might have gotten an extra $75, but you lost my business and I’ll be sure to remember this when I’m recommending process servers to my firm and colleagues in the future.

Review.Titre: We gave the California servers two…
Review.Contenu: We gave the California servers two Unlawful Detainers to serve in January. Neither job was completed in a month. I cancelled the service and another company was able to get the service done in a week. They went over 5 days without even attempting to serve the documents despite my urging.

Review.Titre: If they had actually done what I paid…
Review.Contenu: If they had actually done what I paid them to do.  I gave them the hours that the individual would be at what location and they followed my instructions only once out of 3 times.  I paid for expedited service and they made an attempt within 48 hours but to the wrong address. I will never use them again.

Review.Titre: No one has responded to me about the…
Review.Contenu: No one has responded to me about the service. I added a new address and no one responded about the new address or new service. I had to pay another company to do what I paid you to do!

I submitted documents to be served on four defendants on May 11th. It was not entered into the system until May 13th. As of May 18th I had no communication from ABC Legal nor had a process server been dispatched. ABC Legal then contacted me on the 19th and said they could not find a process server in the area and asked if I would like them to contact the sheriff's office for process. I had to call another local processor to do a rush job to fix the mistakes of ABC Legal. Oh, and the local process server finished the job in less than four hours.

Review.Titre: Used their service a couple of times and…
Review.Contenu: Used their service couple of times and they were reasonable, however, they would not e-file the declaration of non service and their supervisor claimed they no longer support this service even though both their website and links on odyssey eFileCA mentions they e-file case documents to the courts.  I was surprised after a $75.00 fee and failing to serve the defendant they would not send the form directly to the court via e-file.  It turns out, that If they successfully serve an individual based on my past experience they would e-file the affidavit documentation to the court. What their supervisor told me and what their website claims are totally inconsistent what happened to me today.

I had someone in Georgia served on 8/28. The Proof of Service had the wrong address on it. The process server was aware of this, but for whatever reason was unable to change it. I was not notified of this, I only knew by seeing the pictures he uploaded and knew that it was not the correct address. I contacted the company and was the address was corrected and he would mail the new Proof of Service directly to me. My second contact to the company was concern that the new Proof of Service had not been signed. I was updated through the dashboard on 9/8 that it had in fact been mailed to the Atlanta office on Wednesday, 9/6. I contacted the company again on 9/8 and told them I had been told the original would be mailed directly to me. I was placed on hold and then assured that the corrected original was placed in the mail directly to me that morning and would be uploaded to the file. As of today, 9/9, a signed Proof of Service is not showing in my file. I have found this process very frustrating.

Such a mess. I uploaded my documents. Instead of serving my documents they substituted them with someone else’s documents (that had nothing to do with my case) and tried to serve them to my defendant. I’ve noticed these strange changes on my account and immediately messaged them asking to fix this. Their customer service took their time to respond. They didn’t even bother to check what was going on, sent me a general message and disappeared again. My service has been paused, I have no idea what’s going on and when my documents will be served. Also - I’m in possession of someone else’s confidential documents that their client support casually emailed me without making sure I was the owner of the documents. This makes me wonder who might be in possession of my confidential documents

Review.Titre: Worked my butt off serving for them…
Review.Contenu: Worked my butt off serving for them last week, and was underpaid by almost $400. Served 3 that listed as over $100 a piece, and was paid about $10 for each. ABC stated that was the pay for "posting", but I served the 3 in person. Served another that was supposed to pay $70, ABC stated that the identity was not verified, and did not pay me. Gas prices are too high to be on the road serving papers and not get paid... VERY disappointed in this company.

Review.Titre: Will not be using ABC Legal again
Review.Contenu: We paid for a rush delivery of 1 company, that was under 3 entities - it took almost 2 weeks. I explained from the very beginning and throughout that I submitted 3 service requests, for the same address, under the same order because the 3 entities were actually 1 company. Nevertheless, ABC Legal dispatched different servers for each entity and for some reason, each time, only one entity was served. Each time we would begin the process of me explaining that it was the same company, them dispatching different servers, only one or none served. This process was repeated over and over until I finally let them know it was ridiculous that they could not serve one company, at the same address. After I brought this up - Voila! - a process server was dispatched that same day and service was completed. I'm sure this is how ABC Legal racks up costs, so we will not be using them in the future.
Only way to serve people is to falsly imprison them and attempt to assault them with your vehicle at 1:00 am.  One of their star employees behind bars tonight.

I never heard back with a proper response and with the correct paperwork. I’ve had a completely disappointing experience all the way around with the exception of receiving a full refund.   None of the services that I purchased were done.

Review.Titre: After 11 Days the process server claims…
Review.Contenu: After 11 Days the process server claims he couldn't finish his process because there was a tornado. I checked there wasn't! I called yesterday as to why another 6 days have passed without any further attempts. She called Bruce the assigned Process server, and he promised he will go out there today. Another day goes by and nothing Bruce claims he couldnt make it out yesterday but promised he would go today. The level of incompetance is unbelievable. So today I asked to speak with the Supervisor Vincent who is the client support manager. I told him how unacceptable this was and said Bruce will definately go out today. I said I cant waste anymore time on meaningless promises. I wanted a different process server assigned. His response was that Bruce was assigned and that he will for sure Go out today. I insisted that anyone but Bruce and his second response was that maybe I should issue you a refund. I said that would be a good Idea. Need to deal with compatant professionals. NEVER AGAIN!!!!!

Failure to pay as promised, don't understand or accept Pennsylvania rules in Service of Civil Process, even after providing the relevant sections of the Rules of Civil Procedure.  Had to resend affidavits multiple times because they reportedly never received them, even though they were signed, uploaded through their website and mailed.

I had complaints to serve. The first two went without a hitch. The third I had to pay again and resend instructions. I guess the carrier Ahmed can’t read and still asked for instructions after I clearly wrote them down. He also needed me tell him the address again I guess because he could not read it the first time. The service is mostly good but sometimes you get a dumb carrier that slows the process. In that case certified mail Is the best way to serve if possible. I hate paying, then having to baby sit a company employees to do the job.
Company made multiple errors regarding our service. Spoke to staff who was unable to answer what happen, said they would have someone contact us and never did.

Review.Titre: I still have not received my notarized…
Review.Contenu: I still have not received my notarized return to file with the court.

Review.Titre: The company screwed up service and only…
Review.Contenu: The company screwed up service and only admits they guarantee service.They won’t own up to tipping off my defendant.I will take this up with their licensing agency.

As of writing this review the error has still not been fixed. First of all, they do not notify you by email or phone that your proof of service has been signed by the process server, you just have to check and maybe it will be there. Then, when I finally get them, I find that the PDF files are corrupted and the signed entries are scattered across the page, not in the correct locations. Once they finally get back to me about fixing them, I go to download them and while I had two different documents, they uploaded the same proof of service for both of them, not the proof of service for each separate one. It has been days since I notified them of this issue, I've only gotten one message back, saying they are reaching out to another team member to figure out the issue, but the issue is a very simple matter of uploading the correct PDF. There are a lot more affordable process servers out there, if I were in a case that had a higher level of urgency I would expect ABC Legal, especially for the price, to do much better.
your company took the job,,,,, we requested status several times and after 10 days they emailed....."sorry, we are not going To complete the job."horrible!!!

Review.Titre: This place has false job descriptions…
Review.Contenu: This place has false job descriptions and false advertisement.  ABC Legal says you don't need a process server certificate.  CLEARLY STATES NOT REQUIRED and it is required.  ABC Legal should say required if you are hired.  If you get this certificate, you can work any place you don't have to work with ABC Legal.  I don't like the fact that they are not transparent. Put the job description in FULL DETAILThank you for the response ABC Legal but like I said put in FULL DETAILS on what is expected.  People can do this on their own and make more money.  I researched it very well.  You all have a Blessed day as well!

Review.Titre: My last communication was not answered
Review.Contenu: My last communication was not answered.  The description of who was served and who was supposed to be served differed greatly.   Also, the server did not indicate the person served had a purple beard.  That would be my first proof that I served the individual If I was the server.   It was never mentioned.  I do not think it was served to the intended party.
Requested Rush Service. Service was not completed. A week after the original order I was informed that they do not have a process server in my area. Will not use again.

Review.Titre: Worst process server encounter in 28 years
Review.Contenu: I've been practicing for 28 years.  This is the worst process server I've ever encountered.  I think it's just a tech company that provides a platform for requests and farms the service out.  The company doesn't seem to know anything about perfecting service or that's time sensitive.  I requested an expedited service.  Four days later, I had to call them and they refunded by expedited fee and said it would be served that day.  Two days later, first attempt.  After the second attempt, they gave up.  No one informed the entire time.  I called again and was told that the details are on-line.  I sign in, no details.  Just two attempts made at these times and at this address.  I call again and tell them I need a declaration so I can seek substitute service from the Court.  Rep clearly did not understand what that meant.  I try to explain.  Another four days go by, I receive a completely worthless form.  I have no sent them an example and am still waiting for a declaration.
I've had a bad experience that I'm sure you could learn a lot from and hopefully change your customer experiences.

Review.Titre: Paid Extra for a Rush, yet Nothing!
Review.Contenu: I have paid extra for a rush service for process service, and right now its been over 3 days without the first attempt being made!  This is ridiculous!

Review.Titre: Double charged from r 2 day service and…
Review.Contenu: Double charged from r 2 day service and server didn’t perform their duties and was fired. This jeopardizes my Answer.

Review.Titre: Other process servers deliver the proof…
Review.Contenu: Other process servers deliver the proof of service to the local court house. There is no cost to file the documents. I instead I had to personally deliver the server’s document
It wasn’t served.  The document required personal service and you taped it to the door.  The court will not accept that.  There was no service!

Review.Titre: This company claims to be able to serve…
Review.Contenu: This company claims to be able to serve papers for a small claims lawsuit.  They tried to serve the city of Oakland, CA.  After four times, they still hadn't completed it.  If they can't understand how to serve a city, who can they serve?

Review.Titre: Did not deliver within the 5 day…
Review.Contenu: Did not deliver within the 5 day requirement & never filed proof of service with the court according to the judge
They missed the service deadline, I advised them and had to pay another service for a rush, then ABC served the defendant and billed me for the untimely service.
There was too much back and forth. They were not knowledgeable. My service was considered untimely and my court date was moved. Only lucky that the judge did not request me to have it reserved.
Would not recommend. Service was slow, no effort showed, Would update only when I inquired. Waste of time and money.
Refused to refund me for filing fees

Review.Titre: Only used once, but not a good experience.
Review.Contenu: First time using this process server.  Unfortunately, not a positive experience.  They did not make the first service attempt with the agreed-upon time frame.  Their communications were incoherent.  They did not respond to requests for clarification.

Review.Titre: ITS AMAZING HOW YOU WORK FOR A COMPANY…
Review.Contenu: ITS AMAZING HOW YOU WORK FOR A COMPANY SINCE 2016. AND THEY TREAT YOU LIKE YOU NO ONE JUST CANCEL YOUR CONTRACT AND NO WILL EVEN SPEAK WITH YOU.

Review.Titre: Had to continue to contact you to get…
Review.Contenu: Had to continue to contact you to get the process server to do their job, Extremely frustrating.

Review.Titre: I asked them to serve a small claims…
Review.Contenu: I asked them to serve a small claims suit on 9/16.  Nothing ever happened.  I finally called them today to be told that they don't have  process server in the area.  Why did it take 3 weeks to hear this?

Review.Titre: I have already written about this and I…
Review.Contenu: I have already written about this and I won't spend one more minute of a waste of time and money

Review.Titre: The lack of knowledge was pathetic
Review.Contenu: The lack of knowledge was pathetic. They do not even know what is required to do complete service.

Review.Titre: You guys charged me twice on my debit…
Review.Contenu: You guys charged me twice on my debit Card And promised to give me refund and it’s been three weeks no refund was made
Poor communication.  Server didn't attempt service when requested.  Poor customer service.  Would not recommend using this company for your very important legal needs.

Review.Titre: I still haven't received a signed proof of service
Review.Contenu: I have requested a signed proof of service multiple times in the past week and a half, and still have not received it. Instead of apologizing for the delay, they said that I should have shown them there was a proof of service to sign, but it is always standard for a Summons to have an attached proof of service which the process server signs. I would not use this company again after this experience.

Inconsistent Stories and No Serves.I was told by 3 different process servers that the party no longer lived at the address provided, as well as the second defendant was never present to serve, then the facility had a fence around it and they could not enter, which none of the above is correct. We contacted another process server who got them all 3 served the same day.

Respondent was never served, The person serving the papers actually spoke to the respondent who pretended it wasn’t him. Paid $150 for two separate addresses (home and work) for them to tell me the day before court that the address is a bad address and they attempted twice at his work but wasn’t able to get pass security. Definitely wasted my money!

Review.Titre: Worst process servers I have ever used
Review.Contenu: Worst process servers I have ever used. If I could give them less than 1 star, I would.  They were given explicit instructions on service of this individual and didn't do anything I asked them to do. Everything was done incorrectly, unprofessionally, and service was blown, exposing the lawsuit to the defendant's family, thus making him even harder to find. DON'T hire them. They are truly awful.

Review.Titre: No proof of service since 7/15 DOS
Review.Contenu: Got notification that Defendant was served on 7/15. Requested proof of service on 7/20/21. As of 7/28/21 didn't receive copy of the endorsed affidavit. Nor it was filed with court. Will not be using ABC in future. They have great, easy to use portal and responsive intermediaries. But process servers can't do their job. This was the second and last time we used ABC Legal.

All I see online is people who have used this company. I was a server for them and they worked me like a dog. My limit was 90 and I had 130 I asked to raise the limit to 100 but stick to it, they did not. I still have no reason why, but they finally "fired" me via email. NO reason, but I will also say I was in the 98% for the highest pipeline and I rarely fell out of the service window.

Review.Titre: I am VERY displeased with my…
Review.Contenu: I am VERY displeased with my experience.  No follow through, I had to call every day to tell ABC what to do to get the job done, and it was an absolutely nightmare getting the results I paid for.  I ended up having to continue my client's case, which risked him losing an important issue, all because ABC's servers did not know what to do and kept making mistakes.  Absolutely terrible.

You had an order for service for 3 weeks and when I called for an update was told “the process server has been on vacation”. That is ABSURD. Then you completed a service on July 2nd and as of yesterday July 19 a proof of service had still not been completed. I will NEVER use your service again. You are a disgrace to the legal community.

One star. Paid for the basic package, which promises about 7 attempts to serve in 7 days. After multiple calls and messages, I was finally able to get them to serve in about 2 weeks. After which it too the server another 3 weeks to send the proof of service. I am in week 7 and still waiting for the proof to be delivered. The case is closed on their end at this point. Horrible service, needless to say. I highly DO NOT recommend using them.

Review.Pseudo: Law Office of Joseph S. Shook
Review.Contenu: I don’t trust the affidavitIt did not specify the attachment was servedTwitter stated no attachment was servedThen the affidavit was supposed to be updated to say attachment was filed But ABC had them as two separate documents and they were not.All one document was sent PDF to ABC, subpoena and attachmentSo it appears attachment may not been served because they appeared as two separate documents in ABCs  system according to agent from AB CNow I have unnecessary legal issue

The first service I sent was not even attempted for several days after receipt and the guy went to a business on a SUNDAY. Two of the other requests came back as bad addresses, despite the claim you all will verify addresses. I am not really impressed so far and unless we are serving in a state that you are the only option I am not sure I will continue to use ABC Legal.

Review.Titre: Completely terrible I gave them two…
Review.Contenu: Completely terrible I gave them two chances I needed someone to be served in the pa area and twice they failed to notify me that they couldn’t do it they don’t have enough staff was their second reason I’m so annoyed the first time my court date was less then a week away and I had to contact them now it’s two weeks away and I can only hope I can get another company to do the job and my court date doesn’t get dismissed now!

Review.Titre: Had problem their not paying full…
Review.Contenu: Had problem their not paying full eviction fee amount to Court. Aug 2020. I had to deliver $75.00 bal. myself to get case#. Tried again in Dec 2020 for another eviction and asked for help on how to prevent same thing again.   Refused to assist me and no take my calls. I called elawservices.com & they walked me thru procedure to file and only charged $6.50 for file fee. (10 times cheaper) than ABC legal services & without any problems.

awful  they couldn't follow directions and then they signed off the "SERVED" Order with the WRONG DESCRIPTION !!!they said it was a typo error,  But how do you say they served a 5'5 man?  When the person is OVER 6ft tall.They are the only game in town at that price!!!

Review.Titre: We hired your company for a process…
Review.Contenu: We hired your company for a process service on 11/09/2020 and received an email on 11/11/2020 that the service had been perfected. We received the Affidavit of Service, which had an incorrect city. We requested a revision and was sent another Affidavit of Service with the same incorrect city. We have called multiple times, almost daily and still do not have the correct Affidavit of Service. It is now 12/03/2020! Ref#6847235. We will never use ABC Legal again.

Review.Pseudo: V. - V. James Granito, Jr., P.
Review.Titre: We submitted a Summons and Complaint…
Review.Contenu: We submitted a Summons and Complaint for service in a matrimonial action. The turnaround time was very quick but the process server elected to use sub-service which is ineffective service absent a court order. We are currently awaiting a response from ABC as to what corrective action they are prepared to take.

I will never use your services again. It was terrible. My client was served Twice instead of having her ex-husband being served. The server was careless and bad. You charge me extra to have the person served within 48 hours and you did not do so. I am very disappointed to say the least.

One of ABC's process servers banged on my door and I opened it.  She asked if I was the person she had to serve and I said no one lives here by that name.  She proceeded to ask various questions about this person which I did not know answers to.  I am a single woman who lives alone.  I felt she was invasive and aggressive.  I closed my door telling her that I am no longer answering questions.  She returned to my door, banged on it, but I did not open the door again.  She yelled through the door that she was leaving the papers.  This lady reported that she had served papers, which she did not.  She reported false information.  Extremely poor and I feel unlawful service.

Review.Titre: We uploaded a Subpoena for personal…
Review.Contenu: We uploaded a Subpoena for personal service on September 9, 2021. We did not hear anything from anyone regarding any attempts for personal service. We reached out on September 23, 2021 to check on the status since we did not hear anything from anyone. Our Subpoena was not assigned to a process server until September 24. The deponent was finally served on September 25. We received a bill stating 3 attempts had been made to serve the deponent which was not accurate. We have requested a revised bill to reflect the correct amount for payment and have yet to receive a response. Very poor customer service and response time.

Needed to be served in a just built development. They could not bring up the address on whatever maps process they use. They call this an "attempt".  I sent them a Google maps map, a waze map and coordinace, they still could not find the address and refused to give a refund.

I would give 0 stars if it were an option.  I do not appreciate having paid to have one person served only to have the process server, although equipped with a picture of that person, serve someone else who looks noting like the correct person and was much taller than him.  When I brought it to the attention of the company, I was blown off with a sort of "oh well, we are sorry," type response.  Lesson learned though.  I won't be using them again.  Finally, it only shows how tone deaf this company is to have spammed my email with a request for a review.  You asked for it... you got it!

I hired ABC legal on Sept 7 for a court hearing on September 30. The defendant was served on the 18th. I called and emailed many times as my court date approached as a notarized proof of service was required for the hearing. My case was postponed because ABC legal did not provide me the document in time. I lost time and pay from work and need to now do the same at a future date. I got nothing but an apology from ABC legal saying they will do it as soon as they could. I don't understand how it was not possible to fill out a simple form and notarize it within the allotted time, especially from a company who specializes in process serving.

Review.Titre: I had a subpar experience with this…
Review.Contenu: I had a subpar experience with this company.  They bought out or merged with MLQ Attorney Services, a company I had worked with in the past, and had no problems.  This new company is based out of Oregon!  I will stick with a local process server the next time.

I have subpoenas for governmental agencies and banks.  Your idiot process server continues to try to serve them on WEEKENDS.  Several weeks later, surprise, the bank has not been served.  Inexcusible.

I have used ABC Legal Services a number of times.  This was the worst.  After 7 full days of nothing being done I asked when service would be done and they apologized and contacted the process server.  Service was attempted but just said attempted.  I had included the vehicle the person was driving but it did not list if the vehicle was there so I had no way of knowing if the person was avoiding service or just not there.  I had to ask them to let me know that.  The contact for my issues was helpful.  It was a very lengthy process that I felt I had to track every minute.

Paid for rush delivery and first attempt was not made until a week later.  Was told that there was a mixup with the process server upon calling to see what was going on.  Delay caused the individual to get served late, the day before the court date.  Then the affidavit was not signed causing us to have to bring the unsigned one to the court which resulted in the judge throwing out the case and postponing it meaning a wasted trip for us to New York and another one to come.  The signed affidavit then showed up late that afternoon after the court case was over.

Review.Titre: I have used your company on many…
Review.Contenu: I have used your company on many occasions and on the last service request ABC Legal provided the WORST service ever for a simple service of process.  You can go see my comments on that service request.THE WORST SERVICE EVER!!1 FOR NO REASON WHATSOEVER!!

Review.Titre: I had two jobs for them in two…
Review.Contenu: I had two jobs for them in two different cities in California.The so-called registered agent did not check the document for proper court clerk information. As the court clerk had forgotten to date the documents.After I called and informed them, they told me this is a new job! Which it should not be. Because this is why we use a registered processor. To check for accuracy not just to dump documents at a location.But then the guy I spoke to said that they will make it right.  But instead, they messed up the order. And used both jobs to serve 1 document to the same address. After I notified them, they served both documents to the same address! Frankly, They are still not getting it right. It is out of the ordinary how chaotic this simple request has become.

4 full weeks, nothing. Says they turned it over to sheriffs dept and then said sheriffs office doesnt answer.  I paid THEM, not the sheriff. Contacted another process server who served IMMEDIATELY.Dont use these people.

Review.Titre: Strange to receive a survey before order is complete
Review.Contenu: Strange to receive a survey asking how well ABC Legal performed when the order is not complete. Furthermore, the order for service of process is taking forever to complete.

Not enough communication. Package was left with someone who does not legally live at the address. Person addressed in the legal document was not served. ABC Legal said all they had to do was give it to someone who resides there. No name, no signature, that person was just crashing at the house for a few weeks, not a co habitant.

The server complete a wrong form after serving, the form is the the one for the county the court is in. I sent them the correct form to finish, but they ask me to finish myself and then send to the server to sign! This is quite unprofessional. If you made a mistake, you should be the one to correct this, but not let the customer clean your sh**t for you!

Review.Titre: We had two summons that needed served…
Review.Contenu: We had two summons that needed served at the same address.  One summons was served with no problem.  The second summons I was told "no such address" - even though the process server was just there a day prior and effectuated service.  They wanted me to pay another $200 for another attempt.  The communication from the team was fine, and I liked the ability to track the service online - however, we'll be switching up our process server in the future.  We're a newer firm and were hoping to find a company to use exclusively, but it won't be ABC.

Review.Titre: Process server attempted to serve an…
Review.Contenu: Process server attempted to serve an individual at a school on a Saturday when schools are clearly not open.  He also said he could not serve bc it was raining.  I was in the area on that date and it was not raining.  He then attempted to serve the same individual at the same school after school hours.  I called ABCLegal to report this as no one was responding on the customer portal.  I had to hold for 40 minutes before my call was taken.

Ordered service 8/14/2023. There were a couple of documents that were not uploaded correctly by me but I uploaded them the same day that the company contacted me. My papers were finally served on 8/29/2023. I still live with the party who was served so I came home to find that the papers were left on the front doorstep even though the party to be served was at work since early morning. I don’t think this is legal so I hope that this does not come back to bite me in court.

The time that elapsed between when I submitted the requests to ABC Legal, and when the requests were hand served, was far too long for what I needed accomplished. Two of the three requests have STILL after 7 days, NOT been served, and these were "Rush" requests as well.

CS great/Follow Thru Lousy - it's been almost a week and a half and I'm still waiting on my signed proof of service.  The Court's hearing date has already passed and I had to use the text chain of ABC trying to get ahold of their service processor as proof of service.  I appreciate the work they did but the follow through has been very disappointing.  I hope this process server gets a good talking to.  Customer service folks have been really nice and I appreciate their assistance.

Review.Titre: How much is charged for ABC Legal Services should be able to talk to someone PRIOR to placing an order!
Review.Contenu: Wanted to deliver documents in person.  Address on website was false as the office had been moved.  Tried to call twice and after two 20-minute waits, got hung up on.  Went to the posted address.  Not there!  Called and operator said Tacoma does not take walk in clients and to place order online.  Document file was too big so had to break what was sent down and send rest in a message AFTER order was placed.  Got charged $300 which I felt was a ripoff!==============================Reply from ABC Legal Services"Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We regret any confusion with regards to our office locations and any issues that occurred during your document upload. Our team will investigate our office listings to ensure this does happen again."----------------------------------------------------------So they're saying the same thing will happen to others as it happened to me!

Review.Titre: As an attorney I would not use this…
Review.Contenu: As an attorney I would not use this service again.  It took almost a month to get a respondent served on a petition, and took almost a week for the first attempt to even be made. That attempt was unsuccessful, and the reason given for incomplete service was the weather (it was raining). As an attorney who needs petitions served in a timely fashion, this is simply unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Communication through website is not good
Review.Contenu: The communication through it's website is not good. You cannot respond to e-mails wherein ABC's staff is identifying a problem. Uploading documents is a problem. I had service in the same suit to two different parties, but the second matter was not served because ABC claimed I did not upload the document. This happened after I uploaded the document again. If it did not upload to the correct location, that is an organizational problem with ABC. Make your portal and communication user friendly.

They sent someone out to serve the person within 3 days.  However, they served the wrong person and I have been communicating with them for about a week now and they will not tell me if they are going to serve the right person or just keep the money for serving the wrong person.

Review.Titre: I was assured that the subpoena would be domesticated
Review.Contenu: I was assured that the subpoena I had ABC Legal Services serve would be domesticated and it was not. We have now received an objection from the party because the subpoena was not domesticated.

Review.Titre: You should have  found the information…
Review.Contenu: You should have  found the information about Holland America's Seattle office that is easily available on the internet and quickly served the papers instead of just going to the office and looking at it.  I can't believe I had to give you the phone number for the office before you finally called them and finally made arrangements to serve them.

The service of process was performed timely, but dealings with your customer service (or disservice) to get the proof of service has been horrible, to say the least!!! Such level of customer disservice is avoidable by having the process server file the proof of service with the court.

Review.Titre: The site should be more transparent…
Review.Contenu: The site should be more transparent about the actual time frames they are capable of delivering results. I have an issue with the site making you verify the service address on Google, pre-paying for service, to only find out days later that no process server is available for that service area. I don't like the fact that it takes days to verify a filing, with no contact in the interim, and if the county in question requires a special order from the Judge for a private process server then they should let you know upfront before you wait days- at the very least offer guidelines or an explanation.

Your service started out really great, but it turned south fairly quickly. One service was made and the turn around for the production of documents was fast. To no fault on your other server, service was not made. That’s okay. It was honestly expected for this individual to not accept service, however, I requested an affidavit of non-service to be generated. It was generated, but still has not been signed nor notarized. Due to a hard deadline with the court, I asked for the signed affidavit of non-service multiple times and I have been ignored. I still am being ignored as I followed up with you all this morning. I had to submit the unsigned affidavit with the court due to the deadline and it will most likely be rejected. Honestly, this is highly unprofessional and not worth the money that you all are charging for your services. Please follow through until the end. As legal professionals, our deadlines are make or break for our cases. Get it together.Update: To add more fuel to the fire, you guys still have not responded to my requests nor have you responded to email after you said you'd investigate this matter. Due to your negligence and non-responsiveness our office has missed a deadline for our client. Please refund me. You guys are horrible; our office will never use your services again.

Review.Pseudo: Angel - Law Office of Angel Da
Review.Titre: I don’t like that I spent extra money…
Review.Contenu: I don’t like that I spent extra money for a rush service only to have my filing served four days later.

Review.Titre: Just OK, you get what you pay for.
Review.Contenu: I had to call on both of the service requests and make sure the right boxes were checked and that it was marked as substitute service. They had to fix both of them. This is your business not mine and I had to check on your process servers work. What if it was done wrong and ruined my case? You need to check your servers and check your work.

Review.Titre: The server attempted to serve the…
Review.Contenu: The server attempted to serve the Secretary of the corporation (listed as the agent of record) at 9 pm. It was no surprise that no one was working then. The second attempt resulted in the server being told that service should be made at a different address. I asked that an investigation be made of this different address and it was determined that a professional service agent had an office at the different address and a similar sounding corporation had listed CSC … as its agent. I asked that the service agent at this new address be served. The attempt was made and I was told that no one of that name was at that address. When I inquired about the particulars of the service, I asked if the server asked at that address if John Hancock (the party) or if the agent (CSC) was at that address. I was told the server asked for John Hancock. I said go back to the address and ask for the agent (the service was accomplished at that point).  The service at the original address at a time when no one was working and the attempted service on the agent at the different address inquiring if the corporation and not the agent was at that address took about a month and a half.
Had to serve twice. When I inquired about time, no one answered truthfully. The mailed paperwork doesn't even have my name on it

Review.Titre: They did not do what we asked
Review.Contenu: They did not do what we asked.  They were unable to serve a person at work.  Then asked to go @ 4 to his house and he was going to accept service.  They went at all times BUT 4, and then FINALLY got him served.
Service was fast, but on Friday of this week, it will be two weeks since service and I have yet to receive my Affidavit of Service for filing with the court.
The process was very long. And the attorney was not happy with your performance.

Review.Titre: The person named was not the person…
Review.Contenu: The person named was not the person served.  The person served was a minor and I don’t know if that is good enough in court

While filing and loading documents seems to be smooth with a good interface for communication, the major issue seemed to be the process servers being very incompetent. I even began to think the defendant had collaborated with the server to truncate the whole process. From giving a completely wrong description of the defendant to the failure to upload the proof of service several days after service, it is just not something I would be able to comfortably recommend to others.

I requested that they put the same process server on two of the defendants in this case because they could serve two out of he three parties at the same time but they were sent out to two different process servers t so I incurred three more additional unwanted charges because once the first one got served the defendant ducked service for the registered agent one.Then I filed a completed action on one of these defendants once they sent me a Return of Non-Service and the next day they attempted to serve the same party again.

Review.Titre: The process server took our summons and…
Review.Contenu: The process server took our summons and complaint to a business after 5pm.  There is a assumption that most businesses are closed after 5pm and cannot accept service.  An attempt was made the next day and we were sent a photo with instruction on what to do when waiting for a signature.  As the sign was clear in the photo, the process server did not follow directions causing our proof of service to be delayed in filing with the court and reach our office. As a result, the Defendants filed a Motion to Dismiss the claim.  I am very disappointed.

Took 2 weeks to serve a rush service order. First service went to a wrong address 3 miles away. I provided detailed time/day availability instructions & they were ignored. I expected more capable, faster, better service for this sensitive matter. Especially given their DOJ/DOS service claims. Very disappointed. I’ll never use them again & I don’t recommend them.

Review.Titre: Smells like Bait and Switch to me
Review.Contenu: Your advertisement for service states a price of $60 for process service. There is no note that it is a "First-time introductory offer" or anything of that nature. When I approach your firm for repeat service, the price is raised to $135.00, not good. Smells like bait and switch to me. But that's fine, I found someone else.

Review.Titre: Someone elses case was loaded into my…
Review.Contenu: Someone elses case was loaded into my file.  This caused a delay in service, since the papers I needed served were not what was in my file. Due to the error everything was sent to the other claims state and address. The staff was friendly and quick to fix the error once i contacted them and informed them of what had happened on their end and forms were served.

Review.Titre: No matter how simple the serve
Review.Contenu: No matter how simple the serve, for some reason there is always an issue with ABC!  I forgot about this until I decided to try again and experienced the same lack of information, lack of response, lack of assistance, lack of contact, and nearly 2 week delay of service due to ABC's computer system placing a HOLD on my request.  Just awful.  This experience reminds me why I don't use ABC for even the most simple of process serves.

Review.Titre: I had a service that needed to be…
Review.Contenu: I had a service that needed to be served by midnight on the 11th, however there was no attempt made and I paid $190 for rush service.  When I complained they sent the process servers out several more days after the date that needed to be served by even after I said do not attempt to serve since its too late.   Probably will not use service again.  Communication is not the best.

Review.Titre: I suspect it is the process server and…
Review.Contenu: I suspect it is the process server and not the company overall, but this was the slowest most inefficient process of service we have ever had, with no explanation for the slowness. We were not pleased.

Pro: Ease of placing an order and to communicate.Responsive staff.Con:VERY slow service from the time order is placed to the time one attempt is even made (10+ days...)Cost: charging for every little thing.

Review.Titre: We had asked that service be started on…
Review.Contenu: We had asked that service be started on all three addresses we provided but ABC only attempted service at one address. We had to re-instruct ABC again today to attempt service on the other two addresses.

Review.Titre: Lack of knowledge of basic service of…
Review.Contenu: Lack of knowledge of basic service of process rules. I requested service of process to a Texas prison inmate. The process server assigned my case did not know how to serve an inmate.

Review.Titre: Pay for RUSH service on a restraining…
Review.Contenu: Pay for RUSH service on a restraining order.  IT DOESN'T GET FILED IN A TIMELY because you can't efile district court in King Co SO YOU MAILED the Declaration - Regular Mail. Find this out 3 days before hearing when I'm checking online & see it hasn't been filed. Nothing you can do about it? Also note that the address served is wrong. Yes, typo in the order. You DID serve the correct address. But the declaration has the WRONG address. You're supposed to put the address you served in the declartion. Ok, fix it, crap happens. Had to argue to get it corrected/refiled, transferred 4 times because nobody knows who handles that. And RESTRAINING ORDER hearing gets postponed because you're MAILING the corrected affidavit. But by God if that bill is a day late in getting paid there are emails everyday.

Review.Titre: Took so long to get any response from…
Review.Contenu: Took so long to get any response from you about service attempts that I had already hired another process server to complete the job.
Disappointing experience. I've had better experience (and persistence) with the local Sheriff.
Turn around time is slow, not served by the date requested and proof of service still has not been provided 5 days after service.

Review.Titre: Unhappy with the communication when it…
Review.Contenu: Unhappy with the communication when it came to the inability to successfully serve

I requested two Rush service of processes on a Friday, to be served over the weekend, within 48 hours.  One was completed on schedule. The other was not attempted because the server had "technical issues" printing the document to be served (1 page document). The server did not contact ABCLegal to remedy the issue.  I phoned ABCLegal, four days after requesting service, to check on the status. It was then that ABCLegal reached out to the server and remedied the issue and reduced charges to base charge.Additionally, when I attempted to contact ABCLegal in Atlanta, I heard music, then transferred to someone's email.  I have yet to be able to contact the Atlanta office, specifically in the a.m. When I called the long distance number on the website, I heard a recording stating that the office would not open until 8:30 a.m., in a different time zone that is three hours behind ours.  So I had to wait three hours to contact ABCLegal.  This was not acceptable, as my client requested the status of the two services.The first time I was able to get someone on the phone, in the different time zone, I gave her my information and we were working to resolve the issue, I was disconnected.  The service rep made no attempt to call me back.  So I again called for assistance, and connected to a different service rep. This service rep was knowledgeable and was able to give me details of the service that was not yet completed. While I was not satisfied at all with the process server's failure to serve and communicate with ABCLegal, I was happy with the second service rep who remedied the issue.  Lastly, ABCLegal was unable to provide me with a working direct number to their Atlanta office.WELL THERE SEEMS TO BE NO APPARENT WAY TO REPLY TO YOUR RESPONSE.  NO EMAIL OR PHONE NUMBER EITHER.  AND THE EMAIL ADDRESS THAT SENT YOUR RESPONSE IS A NO-REPLY EMAIL ADDRESS.

Review.Titre: Took a long time to get done.
Review.Contenu: The delivery took a long time and the proof took a long time too. The proof signature looks like a scribble from a child. The website asked about my experience with the service before it was even completed. The price was really high for what it's worth.

Review.Titre: Unsure of additional requirements to secure collections!Does this case need to be domesticated…
Review.Contenu: Does this case need to be domesticated and served with a lien on the properties for collection.If necessary, this is my desire. Please advise of applicable services on your end.

Not all of the documents served were listed on the affidavits provided. When I asked for them to be listed, the full set of documents (including the exhibits) were listed on one affidavit, but not on the other. The person I spoke with was very helpful, however, I am still frustrated with the issue.

Review.Titre: Serving an old lady tenant who needs to move on
Review.Contenu: I ordered the priority serve for a tenant. it did not happen in the following two business days. So I called ABC Legal and they refunded the priority fee. When the lady server finally showed up she was patient until I got the old lady tenant to the door. Her description I read later stated she looked 80 pounds heavy. I would put that more at 150 pounds and fat with gray hair.

Review.Titre: They were prompt in getting a process…
Review.Contenu: They were prompt in getting a process server out and I love the fact that I can see the progress. However, two of my four Affidavits of Service came back not notarized. I followed up a week ago and still have not received my notarized Affidavits.

Review.Titre: Fairly simple process with detailed information
Review.Contenu: I like the process for signing up for a new account and submitting an order for service. I appreciate the detailed updates including time stamps and photos. I would appreciate more prompt customer service responses. I will also note to be cautious when "updating" an address as it was easy to accidently accept new charges. Otherwise, an overall decent experience.

Review.Titre: I am still waiting for three out of…
Review.Contenu: I am still waiting for three out of four serves to be served their summons. I understand it's the weekend and am hopeful that by next week all parties will be served. Other than that, the main company was served, which gives me a sense that they are aware of the complaint. I am very pleased how diligent Nikko is with his work. Thank you so much,

Review.Titre: I got what my client paid for.
Review.Contenu: The website is useful, and they did what I needed.I got my affidavits fairly quickly and service occurred within a few days of my order.However, one of the process servers apparently attempted to deliver at the wrong address and sent me a rather snarky message about how I would have to pay him more to find the right one. I was not overly impressed with Kyle's professionalism.
The rush service took 3 days for the processor to make contact which I was hoping 24-48 hours. Overall, the dashboard is user friendly and provides detailed updates.

Review.Titre: I did not receive expedited service.
Review.Contenu: I paid for expedited process service. One attempt was made in 4 days, I called your support number and that server was replaced.  It took 5 days to serve the papers. Not what I'd call "expedited".

Review.Titre: Lack of Communication, Documents not fully served
Review.Contenu: Lack of communication. It is not easy to contact for support. Documents not all served as there is no communication within the messages section. Service is not attempted more than once... Still waiting on my documents to be served a week later.. I messaged him to continue attempts and still no replies.. It was not like this before.

Review.Titre: The service was done quicker than i was…
Review.Contenu: The service was done quicker than i was told however , they should keep in mind most people dont go suing people everyday and should inform their customers after service its their responsibility to turn in the proof of service to the court house. Most lawyers dont take on small civil cases so we as nonlawyers do not know any better.

Review.Titre: I was happy he was served
Review.Contenu: I was happy he was served. After the server refused to return for a 3rd attempt, I had to tell them what time to meet him or his daughter. The over charge has decreased the score ad well. I was charged twice.

Sometimes things get served on time, sometimes it gets served to the wrong address or it gets served to the wrong city. Sometimes the court filings get to the court, sometimes the Judge asks you where the Judgment is, and ABC doesn't know what happened. It is VERY hit and miss whether it'll get there or not.
Serve was relatively quick, but I cant get a notarized proof of service for a while now, still trying...

Review.Titre: I could have used some help locating a…
Review.Contenu: I could have used some help locating a defendant is still not been served. You did a great job with the one you did serve.

Review.Titre: I did not like that there was a delay…
Review.Contenu: I did not like that there was a delay in posting the "proof of service" for ref: 444, additionally I was disappointed with the weak identification process utilized to effect the service.

Review.Titre: took a little longer than I would have…
Review.Contenu: took a little longer than I would have hoped.

We paid for expedited service. The documents were served expedited but it took several days to have our proof of service, which in some cases would have been fatal if we were up against a statute of limitations issue. I sent a message in the portal and they refunded the rush fee, but it was still a day or two later before I got my proof of service.

Review.Titre: We provided a photograph of the…
Review.Contenu: We provided a photograph of the individual to be served. ABC Legal did not provide the process server with a photo for identification. We are now unable to verify "who" was served because the provided photo was not given to process server by ABC Legal. Service overall was an easy process.

Review.Titre: Service was quick but it was not…
Review.Contenu: Service was quick but it was not notarized, per server it is not required but to be safe I think all of these should be notarized to be more efficient in sending these back. It took much longer and I received no response for days requesting it to be notarized. your services are of great value but you need to be prompt and efficient in your responses. Save us all some time and just make it a habit to notarize your signature as these are legal documents.

Review.Titre: No problem with your efiling my small…
Review.Contenu: No problem with your e-filing my small claims documents.  However, after I had the defendant served I contacted your company as to how I was to e-file the proof of service which I feel should be part of your service.  Unfortunately I still do not know how to accomplish this.  Any assistance you can provide would be greatly appreciated.  You have my email or you can contact me by phone at 720-254-4645.

Paid for a rush service - server did not get there on time, did not re-attempt a second service, ABC contact me notified the server had car problems. ABC did credit back the rush payment. They have a great online system however, due to their particular server this one was botched. Just my luck

Review.Titre: Confused with service but happy with outcome
Review.Contenu: I put it at 3 stars because I feel like the 2nd charge for changing an address could be explained better. Although for new customers it’s $10 cheaper in NY versus an existing customer which I had to pay for. The back office customer service was super nice, I just don’t get why a change of address is an additional total charge of $85. Even though I could of changed my email and only paid $75 as a new customer. Either way, I feel like I should of only been charged once not twice because a server makes multiple attempts anyways, so why does it matter if it’s a different address.Other than that issue, they were awesome, informative, helpful, and got the job done.

Review.Titre: I forwarded a process service request…
Review.Contenu: I forwarded a process service request to ABC with instructions (per their website form) to serve within 5 days.  After 6 days I had to contact them, and they in turn had to contact the server.  Later that day I was notified that there was a bad address.  I forwarded a new address the next morning and the process was perfected that afternoon.  My issue is that it should have been taken care of within the 5 days.  I never should have had to follow-up with them to find out the status.

Review.Titre: We paid for 2 rushed subpoenas to be…
Review.Contenu: We paid for 2 rushed subpoenas to be served. One of them was handled perfectly. The other, even though tomorrow will be 7 days from the order being placed, I have no update on and am not clear if it has even been served or not. I messaged for an update 2 days ago and have still not received a reply.

I requested this service on 9/9/2021. Service was effected on 9/21/2021.  Though the service address was correct, the servicee was a lawyer and was ducking service.  However, I think that almost two weeks is an overly long time to wait for an affidavit to be served.  I had to send supporting documents, that anyone could have found on the internet, to help the service along.  I had to call numerous times for responses to my requests; communication was not very regular or consistent. I am happy that the service was finally effected, but I am not impressed by the management and administration regarding this request. Thank you.

I love the convenience.  However, some follow thru is lacking.  I have had orders that were not presented to local server until 6 days after order was placed. I have had a husband and wife served which in general should not be considered two separate serves, one and a half perhaps but not 2x the cost, but then the server failed to subserve one of the parties which makes subsequent service very difficult as it is then expected. I've had it take the server 2 weeks to sign the proof of service.  All of these items should be addressed.

Quick but not effective service on corporations.  I keep getting letters after ABC said service was completed, which state service is not accepted by Agent for Service Company.   It would be nice if process servers knew the service laws re serving corporations/llcs/etc & ensured service was completed & effective - especially since you charge more than other service companies.  For ex: ABC server filed the POSS as substituted service on Secretary of State but the law in CA is an unregistered LLC’s agent for service is the CA Secretary of State (effective through personal service).  It would also be a useful feature if you could find the proper legal entity name of exact subsidiary & AFS.

Also, two times I needed service, the same server was used and that created problems because the person was dodging him because she recognized his face. When I asked ABC Legal to change servers I was told I have to pay a new server fee which sucked because there should be a shuffle. People don't want to be served so why send the same person to the same address to the same person obviously they would dodge the same server.

Our experience with ABC Legal overall was OK but not completely painless. If we were to serve someone else, we would still use them without a doubt. This was the first time we were serving someone and using ABC Legal. That's why I decided to write a detailed review, which might help others especially regular people. 1) Website and the online system is fantastic. The website is functional and responsive, which makes all the difference. It allowed us to see the progress (and lack of it at times which allowed us to identify and resolve problems). You can contact customer support from the website and they reply very quickly. 2) Timeliness: This item is a mixed bag. We submitted our documents and after 2 days all activity stopped on our case. After a week of no activity, we contacted them on the website, and hearing nothing for sometime we called them to see what was happening with our case. They immediately identified the problem, and upgraded our service to speed things up. The service was completed the next day. The case was closed 10 days after the service was completed. However, at that time we had not received the original copy of the service affidavit. When we contacted the customer support from the website, we were told to wait 10 more days and it would arrive, however, it did not. After these 10 days (20 days after the service was completed and 5 days prior to the hearing), we contacted the customer support again to find a solution for this issue. After going back and forth several times (this was painful on our end), ABC Legal was able to get the process server to prepare and send us another affidavit, which was to be delivered only 1 day before the hearing. This caused a lot of stress on our end. However, it was successful. So overall score for the timeliness is poor but can be improved.3) Problem solving: Excellent. Every time we contacted ABC Legal, we talked to people who are problem solvers. They are doing their best to help their customers. 4) ABC Legal Team: Fantastic. Such an amazing team of people working there. They have the kindest and the most professional people in their team. 5) Value for the money: Given everything, it is good. Feedback for ABC Legal: Closing the case after the customer confirms the receipt of the affidavit of service (or attempt) would be a better practice.
